"A.P.241/4/17/11:00": "No luck... I'm unable to track Hitsugi's reading."
"I see. Thanks for trying though, Xiera."
"1. Enga... I'm sorry."
"2. I'm sure Hitsugi is okay."
"It's not your fault, <%me>. It's the fault of my idiot sister who rushed in. It sounds terrible, but she got what was coming to her..."

"ったく、あのバカ妹が。
突っ走った挙げ句しくじりやがって……！"
"I'm sorry. Big sis was taken instead of me..."
"You didn't do anything wrong, Aru. If you hadn't been there, she would have died. I can't thank you enough."
"Indeed... For a time, all of Hitsugi's biometrics showed her as dead."
"While I did confirm her vitals returning to normal after being healed by Aru... I wasn't able to get any other signals afterwards."
"Big sis, are you okay...?"
"Their target is Aru. They wouldn't throw away a pawn like Hitsugi so easily... They'll probably use her as bait to lure Aru in."
"For example, a hostage exchange."
"If it saves big sis, I'll do anything."
"Don't be stupid. You're Hitsugi's savior, and my younger brother. I'm not just going to hand you over."
"In any case, our decision will be based off of what Mother Cluster does."
"Ugh, this is irritating... I want to get Hitsugi back as soon as possible, but..."
"Of course, I'm not going to just sit around and do nothing. Don't you agree, Ardem?"
"...We do know the location of Mother Cluster's base."
"It's existed since ancient times... It was said to drive people insane, and was avoided for that reason. But it still exists, close to us."
"Their base is on... the moon."
"It was impossible to go there with our own technology... but with ARKS backing us, it's a different story."
"I'm sure Hitsugi is there, but... this is the enemy's base of operations."
"This is going to sound harsh, but... Enga, you're going to die if you go there."
"I know. I have no intention of dragging anyone else down with me. I will rescuse her by myself."
"The logical thing to do would be to abandon my stupid little sister. It's absurd to even think of handing over Aru."
"That's why I'm going to rescue her myself. I'm going to go right into their base and take Hitsugi back."
"Big bro..."
"Don't look so worried, Aru. Everything will be okay. I'll rescue Hitsugi, no matter what."
"What, <%me>? Is my lecture on selfish actions running too long?"
"1. There's two people going on this rescue mission."
"2. You need ARKS strength, right?"
"<%me>... I appreciate your offer, but this is my selfish choice. I can't involve you as well."
"...What do you mean?"
"Then let's say that the condition for ARKS cooperating with Earth Guide is that <%me> accompanies you."
"Really, the older brother is just like the younger sister."
"After all we've been through, don't leave us behind now. We're all worried about Hitsugi too."
"My stupid little sister... I'm starting to get jealous at how much people like her."
"<%me>... If you're really going to tag along, I'll rely on your full support."
"Me too! I want to save big sis too!"
"If we're going to head right into the enemy's base, I can't promise your safety."
"I'll bring her back, just you wait."
"Don't even think about trying to stop me, Ardem."
"...There's nothing I can say to change your mind?"
"Not a chance. Not even if you threatened to fire me."
"...As Earth Guide, which has protected people since ancient times, I believe you're doing the right thing."
"I'll send over the coordinates for Mother Cluster's base. <%me>, Xiera, please take care of Enga."
"Wait for me, Hitsugi."
